resources.string: Proxy received but it is not a BluetoothHidDevice

Thank you for testing! There are now 4 input methods: Trackpad, TouchNub, Pointer and Keyboard. 

Trackpad is self-explanatory. 

Nub acts like a joystick, just like a Thinkpad TrackPoint or New Nintendo 3DS C-Stick. 

Pointer acts like a magic mouse, Wii Remote or Switch Joy-Con: Just point and click! (You may need to center the pointer for stability.)

Keyboard works like a normal keyboard, with arrow keys! (Please note that Swiftkey Keyboard is not supported due to bugs with spacebar.)

 Just use the buttons on the side to navigate!


 Connections:
You can connect to any Android phone or Windows computer (Apple products not officially supported yet). Simply connect to your phone from the computer (Make sure both have Bluetooth on!) and wait. (The pointer might freeze for a few seconds. This is normal.)


Thank you so much for trying my app!
Understood! (This message will not repeat on subsequent startups)
It seems that your phone does not support gyroscopic input, accelerometer input, or both. A such, please note that some features like Gyro Mouse will not be available.
